attributes.action: Stop public places banning breast feeding.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Midwives tell us that breast is best for our children but how do you keep breast feeding going on for longer then your stay in hospital? Lots of cafe and shopping centers have banned breast feeding in public and yet they have breast is best posters, how can you say something is right to do if banned?
If there was no bans then more mother may consider breast feeding in stead of bottle.
